unnormalised: Borem asa ixttaंनो, chala ankdeanchi uloup koruya! Fokot konnachey ankde nhoi, punn vhodd dhoni – loksankhya ankde, khas korun Bhartiya Jansankhyekheaṇantlean. Ek vixoy zo poile nodrek thoddo rukho dista, punn mhojem aik, tumkam kitem sodta tem zann aslem zalear taka khub masalo asa. Ami ankdeant buddpachim, zann amcho chhobi korta, ami khoim vetat, ani ami kitlem vegim thoim pauvchem. Demographik gossips mhunn chint, Bharatiya stail!
normalised: Barabor zalem ixttanno, amkam ankdeanchi uloup korum-di! fokot kosle-i ankde nhoi, punn vhoddle ankde – loksankhya ankde, khas korun bhartiye jannamozmachi. ek vishoi zo poile nodrent thoddo sukhall dista, punn mhojem aik, tumkam kitem sodunk zata titleach mel’lache asat. ami tankam sodunk zata titleach mel’lache asat. ami ankdeant buddi marun ami konn asat, ami khanchea votant asat ani kite koxe ami thoim vegim pavoitat tanchem chitran diunk zata. loksankhiy gozall aso chint, bhartiye pod’dotint!

unnormalised: Udharonnakhatir, 2011 jansankhyekheaṇantlean ami 1.21 billion aslem mhunn sanglam. Tem 1,210,000,000 lok, vo fokot ek sovo bhag hea purnn dhartrek. Punn rav, tem ek daska poros odhik zalem! Tea uprant thodde vostu shijtale. 2021 jansankhyekheaṇanchem sarkari ankde ankhi zai asa (pandemikak dhanyvad!), dekhun ami sogllim thoddem andaz khelltat. Odhik andaz amkam 1.4 billion ani lagim dhorta. 2023 meren Bhartachi projecled jansankhya reportan sumar 1,428,627,663 asa! Ami China dhexak sarvant odhik jansankhya dhex mhunn ek sharyet divonk shaktai!
normalised: don hojar egara jannamozman amkam sanglam ami ek point don ek biliyan aslem mhonn. te ek biliyan don xem dha miliyan lok, vo sogllech dakhlli dhartari je sove bhagache aslem. punn ravon ravon, tem ek dakhlli dhartari je sove bhagache aslem. punn ravon ravon, tem eka dashkak voir aslem! tem pollelear tumkam kitem dista tenna tumchem kalliz kalliz dista kiteak. don hojar ekvisachea jannamozmache odhikrit ankdeanchi oddeak chukechem asun ami soglle thodde umedeant asat. soglle umede amkam ek point char biliyanchea lagnant thoim zai mhonn sangtat. bhartiye purnavani don hojar tevisachea raportant amkam ek biliyan char xem atthavis miliyan so xem sattais hojar so xem teshttis zaunk zai! ami chainak loksankhyechea vixexant vhoddlo ghaz gheunk ditelim!

unnormalised: Tacho vichar kor! Hea lok khoim ektthaim zaleat? Konnachi rajyam udrogoticho margar asa, ani konnachi, borem, kiteak odhik nhoi? 2011 jansankhyekheaṇan dakhovlem Uttar Pradesh 200 million vyaktinche loksankhean poilo nombor aslem. Maharashtraithai upar aslem, 110 million rahivashinchi porot. Ani dokhinnim, Kerala sadharnnponnan 93.91% shikxanache dharaniche utarank lagun loksankhya ghanttkayechim uloupant yetale! Tumam distai, ankde kotha sangtale!
normalised: tacho vichar karat! hacho arth kite zata? kiteak hea lokanchea ekvott kiteak zata? konnachem rajy vhoddlam ani konnachem vhoddlem nhoi? don hojar egara jannamozmachyo ankdeanchi mahiti sangtat ut’tar prodex dona xem million munisankhiyekhinn zata. moharastrache lokankui thoim vochpacho khuxikallo asa, ek xem dha million residentam soit. ani dokxinnant keral loksankhyeche gunthukponnacher uloup kortat, tachi saksharotai sumar nove xem tin point nove ek percent aslem mhunn! tumi ankdeacheo kaniyo aikatat!

unnormalised: Ani to fokot vhodd ankdeam vixhe nhoi, vadhichem dorui mahatvache asa. Dashkachi vadh (2001-2011) sumar 17.7% aslem, punn sogllim novea jansankhyekheaṇankhatir unne dorachi apochkorta. Kutumb yozna upkram, vadhik shikxan, ani arthik udrogoti soglle aplem patrao kartat, bhai! Hem rajyambhitor bodlop dekhunk mon mohak karta. Kaim rajyam 25% vadh dakhoitat zalear dusrim fokot 5% meren pauvtat zann dhex bhitorche samajik-arthik vegleponn dakhoita.
normalised: ani tem vhoddle ankdeanche vixexant nhoi, voddi vadoun zannim zatim tim muhim asat. dasabdi voddi (don hojar ek te don hojar egara) sumar sattra point sat percent aslem, punn soglle novea jannamozmak unni voddi purnavani kortat. gharbandar yozna, saksharotai vaddo ani arthik pragati tankanchyo bhagak purnatat, bhai! te rajyam-modim bodol dekhun kitloch khuxikallo lagta. kaim rajyam purnatat panchvis percent voddi dekhaitat zalear dusrim sumar panch percent maratat, tem sod’danche ani arthik-samajik sontulnam dokhoitat.

unnormalised: Uprant gramin-shahari vibhag asa. 2011 vorsa, sumar 68.84% ami azun gamvant aslem. Shaharichem kshetr vegim vadttat, borem sondinche khatir probhas kortole. Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore sarkichim shahrank tech kshetrant ani vittiya kendrant nokreo sodtolim lokamni thonstonthos bhartale. Buniyadi dhanchachi vikas ani sansadhan vyavasthapan hem vagichem vadhak lagun khoob mahatvachem asa.
normalised: uporant graminn-xahari vibhaznn asa. don hojar egara udenticho, sumar sattya point atth char percent ami gamvant aslem. xahari zage vegim vadoun, chodd favo zalear munis bhonvtani yetat. mumbaim, dil’li ani bengllururichea xaranchi udentichea ani arthik kendramchea bhagak munisankhiyechea zhonttant vhoddli lagta. hea voddiche kodden suvidha vikas ani vasthavacho vapar mahatvacho asa.

unnormalised: To fokot kitlo ani konn khoim tench vixhe nhoi. Hajea kallant, samajik-arthik mahiti khub mahatvachi asa. Ling gunot'tor (1000 dadleanchea uprant kitlim bailam) herui ek mahatvacho ankdo asa. Ho ankdo sudharop bailam sakshamikornachem suchok asa ani tem soglle vixhe asa, nhoi mhonn? Tech porim, SC/ST rachna amkam samajik saman ani samaveshant dhyan divnk laita. Ho jansankhyekheaṇ mahiti nirdhisht samajik dhoronam tayar korpak khub mahatvachi asa.
normalised: tem sumar kite tache vixexant nhoi, punn konn ani konn khanchea zagear tanchem vixexant asa. hea disam-modim, arthik-samajik mahiti khari khup mahatvachi asa. lingachea gunottar (ek hojar dadleanche fattim striyank ek number) ek muhim ankddo asa. hea ankddeache sumarun striyanche xokti dokhoitat ani te sogllem zai, nhoi mhonn? toxem, es-si slash es-ti rochnna amkam samajik sontuln ani antorbhavnache vixexant gunn diunk zata. hem jannamozmachi mahiti yogy samajik yozna korunk muhim asa.

unnormalised: Dekhun gheka tumi jansankhya ankdeam vixhe ghoshnak vachatai tea vellar, ugddas dovri te fokot kaim nirarthak ankde nhoi. Tem amchem, amchem samajachem, amchem bhavisyachem pratibimb asa. Ani ami sogllim 2021 jansankhyekheaṇanchi vatt pollet zalearui, poiliche ankdeamni bhutkall, vartman ani bhavisyank ek darshan dilam. Buniyadi dhanchachem niyojan korcheantle sansadhanacho vatchpo korpak, te dhoronam bandpak ani Bharat, amchea Bharatak sopnanche adhar asa. Datant buddt rav!
normalised: dekhun tumi loksankhyeche ankdeanche vixexant kherikhenar khobor dekhtoch, ulo kitekai nhoi, tem kitekai nirarthok ankddo nhoi mhonn yad dukhoiyeta. temi ami, amchea samaj, amchem bhavitavy dokhoitat. ani ami soglle don hojar ekvisachea jannamozmak oddeak choltat zalear, poilimchea jannamozmani poilichea, ekhdeachea bhavitavy ani vartmanank dishta. suvidha yoznak korpak ani vasthav divpak, te buniyadi asa te udexim ami amchyo yozna ani sopnam bharat, amchea indiekarak bandhtat. mahitint buddi mart!
